Directions: Cut bread into 10 diagonal slices (5 in. x 2-1/2-in.). Cut each slice with a 4-in. musical note cookie cutter.  (Discard remaining bread or save for another use.)  In a bowl, combine the butter, garlic salt and oregano.  Brush over one side of each note.  Place on a baking sheet; sprinkle with cheeses.  Broil 4 in. from the heat for 2-3 minutes or until cheese is melted.
